oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-08-06 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 8, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Sonny James, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Chet Atkins, Rod Brasfield, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Old Hickory Singers; Sonny James; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- Go Back You Fool (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Faron Young, Grant Turner) -- Faron Young introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- She's Mine, All Mine (Old Hickory Singers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Sonny James -- Too Much (Sonny James) -- Faron Young talks -- Sally Gooden -- Faron Young talks -- Where Could I Go But To The Lord (Faron Young) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert jingle (Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- I'm Forever Blowing Bubbles (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Young, Faron; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Old Hickory Singers; James, Sonny
